alert.note: Alert for Lawrence; Limestone; Morgan (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 23 at 9:36PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Limestone, northwestern Morgan and northeastern Lawrence Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 933 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Tanner, or 7 miles south of Athens, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Heavy downpours that lead to reduced visibility and minor street flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall could cause ponding on area roadways and minor flooding along area creeks and streams. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Madison, Athens, Tanner and Belle Mina. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
